All -

Sorry if this is already answered, but I can't find it.

I have a te=
st case that excercises a Java 1.5 'enum'.  This test case
works just fine =
in Eclipse 3.2.0 with the Java 1.5 JDK installed. 
However; when I execute =
those tests from 'ant' using the 'junit' task,
they fail with a NoClassDefF=
oundError on the 'enum' "class."

I've tried upgrading to Ant 1.7.0Beta3, t=
hinking that perhaps my old
(1.6.5) installation wasn't compiled with Java =
1.5.  I've also
upgraded my junit.jar to junit-4.1.jar.  I've also ensure t=
hat all of
my "targets" and "source" attributes to the javac task are set t=
o
"1.5".  Nothing seems to help.

Any advice would be HUGELY appreciated.

=
Thanks!
jared
